api_list.name: /search/languages
api_list.description: Search for language by language name used by audio and subtitle searches

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: search language by language name

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com/search/languages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /search/titles
api_list.description:
Parameter Notes:
new_date will either take a single date and check for all titles added after that date or it will take 2 dates separated by a comma to check titles added between them.

optional_parameters.name: country_andorunique
optional_parameters.description: and=titles in all countries, or=any title in these countries, unique=unique titles in chosen countries

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: search all titles by name

optional_parameters.name: start_rating
optional_parameters.description: number between 1 and 10, aligns with imdb rating, if there is one

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: movie or series

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: Order of Response

optional_parameters.name: subtitle_id
optional_parameters.description: search by subtitle with CSV list of language_ids see /search/language

optional_parameters.name: genre_id
optional_parameters.description: search by genre with CSV list of genres, see /search/genre

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: end_rating
optional_parameters.description: number between 1 and 10, aligns with imdb rating, if there is one

optional_parameters.name: audio_sub_andor
optional_parameters.description: and=language in bot audio and sub, or=language in either audio or sub

optional_parameters.name: start_year
optional_parameters.description: year date > 1900

optional_parameters.name: top250
optional_parameters.description: IMDB top 250 Movies number 0-250

optional_parameters.name: top250tv
optional_parameters.description: IMDB top 250 Series number 0-250

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

optional_parameters.name: end_year
optional_parameters.description: year date > 1900

optional_parameters.name: person_id
optional_parameters.description: search by person with CSV list of people, see /search/people

optional_parameters.name: audio_id
optional_parameters.description: search by audio with CSV list of language_ids see /search/language

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: CSV list of country IDs e.g. 46,78

results.title: The Night Owl
results.synopsis: Blind acupuncturist, Kyeongsoo whose eyes are dimly visible in the dark, witnesses the death of the crown prince. King Injo is driven into madness since then while Kyeongsoo attempts to reveal the truth behind the prince`s death.

results.title: Prom Pact
results.synopsis: It`s the height of prom season, and high school senior Mandy Yang and her best friend and fellow outsider Ben are surrounded by over-the-top `80s-themed "promposals." However, Mandy keeps her eyes focused on a different goal: her lifelong dream of attending Harvard. When she finds out her acceptance has been deferred, she is determined to do whatever she can do to get herself off the waitlist, even if that means asking for help from the one person she abhors – popular basketball all-star Graham Lansing, whose father is a powerful senator and Harvard alum. Once Mandy becomes Graham`s tutor, she begins to realize there`s more to him than she thought and perhaps something more to life than Harvard.

results.title: Man on Fire
results.synopsis: An agent newly retired from the CIA agrees to become an Italian businessman`s bodyguard in this adventure film. Things fall apart though, when terrorists kidnap the Italian`s daughter and the agent must rescue her.

results.title: NHL Big City Greens Classic
results.synopsis: The NHL visits Big City for the first-ever “NHL Big City Greens Classic.” Join the Green family as they lace up their skates and take to the ice for the matchup between the Washington Capitals and New York Rangers.

results.title: Life Must Go On
results.synopsis: When her midnight gymnasium program for wayward teens is under threat of being defunded, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to save it. With the help of an unemployed, has-been star jock as the coach, the motley crew of teen girls learns that dodging their problems can work temporarily, but they must learn to eventually stand back up and overcome their challenges.

results.title: Kung Fu Cult Master
results.synopsis:
Chang Tsui San of Wudang Sect and Yan So So have a son named Mo Kei. Tsui San and Xie Xun become sworn brothers, but the six major orthodox sects in the martial world resent their relationship. They try to force Tsui San to reveal Xie Xun`s whereabouts. To protect his sworn brother and the sect, Tsui San and So So commit suicide. Meanwhile, Mo Kei is ambushed and mortally injured. Chang San Fung barely manages to preserve Mo Kei`s life. This stirs the jealousy of his senior Sung Ching Su, who later collaborates with Chow Chi Yu of Emei Sect to harm him. 
One day, Siu Chiu sneaks into Wudang to steal the Heavenly Sword. As Ching Su and Chi Yu pursue her, Mo Kei defends her. They fall off a cliff but survive and meet Huogong Toutuo. Mo Kei masters Nine Yang Divine Skill in the process.

results.title: Aile Hukumeti
results.synopsis: Salih is a young teacher assigned to the village of Elaldı. He writes a petition to the Ministry of Family Affairs to prevent consanguineous marriages in the village. The ministry`s solution project stipulates that those who do not marry their relatives can obtain title deeds for the houses they live in and the fields they work. Salih, who begins to list those suitable for marriage, encounters an unexpected situation, in which people are separated from their loved ones.

results.title: Celal And Ceren
results.synopsis: Celal and Ceren have been together for a long time and Ceren is waiting for a marriage proposal that doesn`t seem to be coming anytime soon. The relationship finally comes to an abrupt end when Celal secretly attends an old friend`s bachelor party.  Although he seems to take his newfound freedom well at the beginning, Celal will eventually do everything to win Ceren`s heart back.

results.title: Black Vengeance
results.synopsis: Tang Kar-yung and Lam Ting-kwok, two best friends who wander on streets in Hong Kong are taken under Lee Ah-chai`s wings. Lee Ah-chai is a wealthy Teochew businessman. As Ah-chai thinks highly of Ting-kwok, Kar-yung gets jealous and soon, the two drift apart. Kar-yung turns the gun round against Ah-chai and embraces Chu Lo-tai while Ting-kwok chooses to make a living in Malacca. Years later, Kar-yung kills Chu Lo-tai and set up his own gang. He also plots to eliminate Ah-chai and Ting-kwok. Ting-kwok and Ah-chai who were filled with enormous grief and anger, return to Hong Kong to seek revenge against Kar-yung.

results.title: 20/20 Presents: John Lennon: His Life, His Legacy, His Last Days
results.synopsis: On Dec. 8, 1980, the world stood still as it learned about the death of John Lennon, a music icon and former member of The Beatles. Now, nearly 40 years after that infamous day and days after what would have been his 80th birthday, the season premiere of “20/20” tells the story of Lennon’s life, final days and lasting legacy through the eyes of close friends and colleagues, and rarely seen footage from the ABC News archives. The program includes new interviews with Bob Gruen, legendary rock ‘n’ roll photographer who took the iconic photo of Lennon in his “New York City” T-shirt; Jack Douglas, producer of Lennon and Yoko Ono’s “Double Fantasy” album; and Elliot Mintz, close friend and Hollywood publicist. The two-hour program also includes the last interview Lennon did the day he died and interviews with the radio reporters who conducted it.

results.title: The Truth Beneath
results.synopsis: Jongchan is a dynamic young conservative politician in a provincial city who is leading polls for an upcoming election to the National Assembly. His wife, Yeonhong, is busy helping him behind the scenes, but 15 days before the election, their daughter, Minjin, disappears. Although it’s not the first time she has run off, Yeonhong is taken aback and becomes increasingly desperate as the days pass and her daughter doesn’t appear. Meanwhile, tension rises between the couple as the police fail to gather clues, and Jongchan continues to devote himself to the campaign. Then Yeonhong begins to discover that many of the things her daughter told her about her school life and her friends were all lies. Pushing deeper into the case, she uncovers darker secrets that threaten to tear her life apart.

results.title: The Sparring Partner
results.synopsis: Inspired by the sensational 2013 family murder, Henry Cheung partners up with his friend Angus Tong to murder and dismember his parents. In the courtroom, two veteran lawyers, Wilson Ng and Carrie Yau, defend the pair in pleading not guilty. Prosecutor Allen Chu suggests the murder was a calculated move for money. But the plot thickens when Wilson Ng and Carrie Yau begin to present their case and when Angus Tong rebuts all accusations on his own. The truth becomes all the more elusive as the defendants play the role of genius and idiot in court. In the breakroom, discussions between the nine jury members spiral into debates about right and wrong.

results.title: Nazis at Nuremberg: The Lost Testimony
results.synopsis: Never-before-heard trial testimony reveals shocking new details about World War II and the inner workings of the Nazi war machine. Hear the raw voices of Hitler`s criminal henchmen - such as Hermann Goering, Wilhelm Keitel, Albert Speer and Rudolf Hess - as well as the victims and witnesses who bravely testified against them.

results.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Master of Ransom
results.synopsis:
A highly intelligent criminal mastermind, Logan Lung (Tony Leung) capitalizes on the handover of Hong Kong whereby there is a lapse of policing before the British government fully returns the sovereignty to China. He kidnaps a wealthy businessman and his son for a staggeringly high ransom of 8 billion HKD. Without reporting it to the police, the family of the wealthy businessman pays the ransom for the returning of the kidnapped.
Determined to apprehend Logan Leung, Hong Kong Police Force has sent in an undercover cop, Sky Ho (Louis Koo), to infiltrate the criminal organization notwithstanding. After several dangerous twists, Sky Ho has finally identified Logan’s next target, but it seems to be a misdirection that Logan Leung has set up. Can Sky Ho successfully accomplish his mission to save the hostage and apprehend the kidnappers?

results.title: Seven Billiard Tables
results.synopsis:
Ángela and her son Guille travel to the big city when her father Leo suddenly falls ill. When they arrive, Leo has just died, and his lover, Charo, tells Ángela that the family business has gone bankrupt. Charo sees selling the business, a pool hall with seven tables as the only way to pay off the debt. Soon after, Ángela learns that her husband has disappeared under mysterious circumstances. Ángela is forced to overcome that harsh reality and rebuild her life. The first thing she does is use her savings to get the pool hall up and running again.

Some flashing lights sequences or patterns may affect photosensitive viewers.

results.title: Poisoned Love: The Stacey Castor Story
results.synopsis: Stacey Castor weathered the storm of her first husband’s death and managed to find love again with her boss, David. But when David is discovered dead of an apparent suicide, the police suspect some foul play, as David’s death mimics that of Stacey’s first husband. As the evidence begins to fall into place, a suicide attempt by her daughter Ashley further complicates the investigation. Was Stacey a victim of a tragic circumstances or a Black Widow out for the attack? Based on a true story.

results.title: Chris Watts: Confessions of a Killer
results.synopsis: When Chris Watts (Sean Kleier) tearfully pleaded to television cameras for the safe return of his missing pregnant wife Shanann (Ashley Williams) and their two young daughters, dark secrets loomed just beneath the surface. As the story spread, hearts went out to the distraught father and husband, who appeared to lead a charmed life. But days later, after failing a lie detector test, Chris confessed to brutally murdering his family and slowly revealed the horrific details of their deaths. Friends and family were left reeling, looking for answers as his double life and secret affair came to light. Brooke Smith portrays FBI agent Tammy Lee, who helped to bring Chris Watts to justice.

results.title: Firehouse Dog
results.synopsis: Rexxx, Hollywood`s top K-9 star, gets lost and is reluctantly adopted by a young boy. His father, fire chief of a rundown station agrees to the adoption only if his defiant son takes care of the K-9. Little do they realize Rexxx will not only bring them closer but also bring some much-needed faith back to the fire station.

results.title: Cobb
results.synopsis: Famous sports writer Al Stump is thrilled, at first, when he is personally chosen by baseball legend Ty Cobb to write his official, authorized "autobiography." Cobb says he wants to set the record straight, but Stump soon learns that Cobb`s reputation is deserved. The man is corrosively racist, violent, angry, misogynistic and abusive. Stump is torn. Should he write the whitewashed book that Cobb wants, a simple tale of a baseball great, or should he write the truth about Cobb`s tortured and tortuous life? He finally realizes he doesn`t have to choose. He writes both books – one for Cobb, and one for the public.

results.title: Patsy & Loretta
results.synopsis: “Patsy & Loretta” is based on the untold true story of the friendship between two of country music’s greatest icons, Patsy Cline (Megan Hilty) and Loretta Lynn (Jessie Mueller). When they first met, Patsy was already one of the biggest stars in country music while Loretta was just a coal miner’s daughter, starting off with little to her name but a $17 guitar. Instead of seeing Loretta as competition, Patsy took Loretta under her wings to help her make it in Nashville. Soon, they became close friends, touring together, bonding over their husband troubles and commiserating on being females in the male-dominated music business. Then in 1963, the country music community was struck with a tragedy when at just age 30, Patsy died in a plane crash. Despite the devastating loss of her friend, Loretta continued on in the industry and is today, known as the First Lady of Country Music. To this day, Loretta remains grateful to Patsy for her mentorship and above all, friendship, as the country music trailblazer that paved the way for Loretta.

results.title: Escaping the Nxivm Cult: A Mother`s Fight to Save Her Daughter
results.synopsis: When Catherine learns about a leadership seminar from a new organization called NXIVM, she decides to take her twenty-year-old daughter India to the professional development meeting. Led by the extremely enigmatic Keith Raniere, Catherine can’t help but shake the feeling there’s more than meets the eye with the self-help organization. Despite Catherine’s best efforts, India is drawn deeper into the cult, eventually joining a secret sorority of female members who are branded with the cult leader’s initials, ordered to maintain a restricted diet and forced to recruit other women as sex slaves. Escaping the NXIVM Cult: A Mother`s Fight to Save Her Daughter tells the story of a mother who will stop at nothing to get her daughter back and exposes the intricate seductive power of Allison and Keith and the mental and physical abuse India fell victim to.

results.title: Adriana Trigiani`s Very Valentine
results.synopsis: Based on a novel by best-selling author Adriana Trigiani, “Very Valentine” tells the story of the Angelini Shoe Company, one of the last family-owned businesses in Greenwich Village that has been making exquisite wedding shoes since 1903, but now teeters on the brink of financial collapse. To save the family business from ruin, Valentine Roncalli (Kelen Coleman, “Big Little Lies,” “The Newsroom”) – apprentice to and granddaughter of master artisan Teodora Angelini (Jacqueline Bisset, “Nip/Tuck”) – must bring the family’s old-world craftsmanship into the 21st century. Juggling unpredictable love lives, duty to their family, and a design challenge presented by a prestigious department store, Valentine and Teodora are on a quest to build a pair of glorious shoes sure to beat their rivals. Also, in the course of discovering her true artistic voice, Valentine discovers true love as she turns her life and the business upside down in ways she never expected.

results.title: Misbehaviour
results.synopsis: In 1970, the Miss World competition took place in London, hosted by US comedy legend, Bob Hope. At the time, Miss World was the most-watched TV show on the planet with over 100 million viewers. Claiming that beauty competitions demeaned women, the newly formed Women`s Liberation Movement achieved overnight fame by invading the stage and disrupting the live broadcast of the competition. Not only that, when the show resumed, the result caused an uproar: the winner was not the Swedish favourite but Miss Grenada, the first black woman to be crowned Miss World. In a matter of hours, a global audience had witnessed the patriarchy driven from the stage of the Western ideal of beauty turned on its head.

results.title: Yagmur Rengi
results.synopsis: Yağmur, drawing pictures on electrical transformers for the public benefit, gets in a friendly and warm neighborhood that she longed for all her life, in her quest to get rid of her childhood traumas. This new adventure will not only relieve the longing for the warmth of a family she wished, but also opens the door to a totally new life where she will forget the pangs of love in her heart.

results.title: Your Story
results.synopsis: Hakan, an amusing and energetic man and Esra, a realistic, independent woman, are a married couple in their mid-thirties. After being together for seven years, both their marriage and careers come to a turning point: to have a baby. At decision stage, Hakan`s mother Meral, as dominant as she is, starts insisting on becoming a "granma".

results.title: Yozgat Blues
results.synopsis: Yavuz and Neşe are a couple who sing pop songs of the 70’s in seaside resorts during summer and in different towns of Anatolia during winter. They have been working together for fourteen years in boredom and mediocrity. This winter, Yavuz and Neşe come to Yozgat which is a small town in the middle of Anatolia after getting an offer to sing as a duo at a night club.

results.title: Zengo
results.synopsis:
Zerrin is an upstart young woman with a passion for fashion. Due to urban renewal, she owns several condos in the new residences built in the middle of her old neighborhood. She dreams of becoming a well-known designer. After her long-time rival Menkıbe steals her designs, Zerrin combusts and embarks on an adventure that will change her life.

Some flashing lights sequences or patterns may affect photosensitive viewers.

results.title: Vendors Meeting
results.synopsis: How much chaos can three white goods dealers who come to Istanbul from Anatolia get into in three days? The paths of Namik, Adem and Sadik, three men going through difficult periods in their lives, intersect at a vendors meeting. After a series of unexpected events, they find themselves caught in a crazy plan. To survive, the three dealers have no choice but to trust each other and move fast.

results.title: Vizontele
results.synopsis: The film is about the introduction of television to a small village in southeast of Anatolia in 1974. Employing a tragicomic language, it tells the story of villagers` efforts to adapt to changing circumstances while trying to include technology into their emotions, poverty, love, happiness and distance...  The successful production shines a light on Turkey`s recent history.

results.title: The Way Of The World
results.synopsis: 29 year-old introvert Serdar has been in love with the idealist journalist Gizem for a long time but she doesn’t even know he exists. After getting in a bet with his roommates Batu and Masal, he has to ask Gizem out. Since Gizem is currently writing on people with philophobia, he introduces himself as one. In the middle of his mission to steal her heart, he also tries to deal with Gizem`s boss Arda, who is in love with her and her mother Halime, who is constantly trying to set her up with someone.

results.title: We Are In Trouble
results.synopsis: After receiving the news of his father`s death, Mert sets off in his car for Adana, as he is afraid of flying. At a gas station, he meets Yiğit, whose father passed away seven months ago. To follow his father`s advice not to drive alone, Yiğit persuades Mert to go with him by pretending that Mert`s car has been stolen. An adventurous journey and a big surprise await them at the end.

results.title: Welcome Back
results.synopsis: Mehmet is one of a kind and a naïve 32 year-old photographer who living in Istanbul. When Selin, the love of his life breaks up with him, Mehmet bums out but as luck would have it, he soon meets Defne. Defne happens to be a mysterious and nutty woman. Mehmet and Defne become a great team when Defne promises to help him win Selin back. This collaboration changes both of their lives unexpectedly.

results.title: What will I become?
results.synopsis: Sertab, 28 years old but unable to lead a "regular" life, is an indecisive, non-conforming woman in search of her identity. Sertab, who was left homeless and penniless after her home burned down, breaks down when her sister Harika says, "You won’t amount to anything". She promises herself to show everyone what she will become. Sertab`s adventure full of love, heartbreak, success and failure begins with this promise.

results.title: Who Are You?
results.synopsis: Even if it means risking their lives, Tekin, a clumsy private detective and retired traffic cop Ismail, face all sorts of danger to find a missing girl. The story begins with a simple missing girl case and transforms into an adventure in which accounts are settled and games progress. The situation gets so out of hand that it becomes unclear who is innocent and who is guilty.

results.title: Tiger of Berlin
results.synopsis: Ayhan Kaplan is a Turkish citizen who earns a living as a boxer and bodyguard in Berlin. Life’s not a bed of roses for Ayhan or his trainer Cemal. They are heavily in debt and, in order to repay the money they owe, they start hoping for a miracle to come their way. However, neither of them know where or how they can find this miracle. “Berlin Kaplanı” is based on the chance of a possible miracle.

results.title: To Die For
results.synopsis: Turkish ground forces enter the most dangerous zone in the world, amidst a civil war that`s been going on for seven years, with no allies. In the meantime, a special forces unit under the command of lieutenant Alparslan reveal an ambush against the Turkish army with the help of flight lieutenant Onur.

results.title: Travel Mates
results.synopsis: Days before Eid, a salesman fired from his job drives to Ayvalik to meet his girlfriend`s family, but the trip goes astray due to his zany travel buddy.

results.title: Travel Mates 2
results.synopsis: Onur and Seref became roommates and colleagues within a year. Seref manages Onur’s career rather unsuccessfully. When Onur decides to return to his former job, Seref arranges a tour full of surprises. Love, laughter and adventure await them again on this journey. About to run into the realities of life while chasing their dreams, can Onur and Seref achieve their goals?

results.title: Trouble On Wheels
results.synopsis: Kudret has always lived life by the book. Until, that is, his routine is turned upside down by a succession of surprise events. Kudret jumps into his much loved car and sets off for Antep. As he clocks up the miles, so he makes a bunch of new friends. By the end of the marathon trip, Kudret will have discovered both the value of true friendship and the delights of living without rules.

results.title: The Stranger in My Pocket
results.synopsis: Revelations come to light when seven friends reunite and play a dinner party game that forces them to share their cell phone updates with the friends in this group.

results.title: Take Him Back
results.synopsis: A woman tries to save her marriage and win her husband back whilst trying to solve her mental problems. Yonca, who is passionately attached to her husband, does everything for the sake of saving her relationship. ‘’Take him back’’ is a passionate real life love story where everyone can find a piece of their own life.

results.title: Telling Tales
results.synopsis: Riza is a minibus driver who is loved by the folks of Surici, the neighborhood of Istanbul, where he was born and raised. Ayperi on the other hand is the outsider who will turn Riza’s life upside down, as well as everything he knows and is familiar with. This is the story of two young people nestling under the wing of timeless friendship in an ordinary neighborhood.

results.title: Sour Apples
results.synopsis: After two terms as mayor of the town, Aziz Ozay has just failed to be re-elected for a third. He lives with his wife and three daughters in a spectacular house complete with orchards and a garden. One night Muazzez catches one Ozgur, one of the men who watch them from behind the orchard. And so begins an adventure that grows into a web of stories taking on marriages for love, marriages under protest, military takeovers.

results.title: Squad
results.synopsis: This is a story of a young group of men who come from different backgrounds and get together to perform their military service. The film reflects the dialogues between warhorses and rookie soldiers as well as their strong bonds, funny conflicts and dreams.

results.title: Sister in Law
results.synopsis: When Ahmet`s jealous sister Yeliz plots to wreck his engagement, a young man does everything he can to protect his betrothed from her devious schemes.

results.title: Red Istanbul
results.synopsis: Many years after leaving the city to live overseas, writer-editor Orhan Sahin returns to Istanbul to work on the first book by prominent director, Deniz Soysal. Deniz shares a waterside mansion on the Bosphorus with his family, whose fortunes are fading fast. From the very first day, Orhan finds himself in the thick of Deniz’s family, his complicated relationships and inscrutable friends.

results.title: Olmaz Oluversin Gari
results.synopsis: The marriage of Derya and Güney made Aliş and Seda very sad. When Şişman falls into the pit dug by treasure hunters, Gendarmerie comes to the excavation area and sees some historical artifacts in the pit. The excavation area has now become a protected area. As the video comes to light, Gendarmerie arrests Salih in handcuffs. Meanwhile, archaeologists come to Sadri`s house for the sculptures discovered in the field. Derya suggests Güney that they divorce.

results.title: Organik Love
results.synopsis: Bülent is the clumsy son of a wealthy family. Besides, a lot of money is spent on him so that he is not reproached for this ineptitude. His father allows Bülent a month to end this: He will either change his ways or be cut off without a cent! While Bülent finds love in the runaway bride Esma, after all kinds of adventures on this quest, Esma`s brother Davut is after them for the sake of honor.

results.title: Osman Pazarlama
results.synopsis: Osman is a small scale entrepreneur in Istanbul where he operates from his hangar which also serves as his office. He dreams of getting rich through the sales of products imported from the Far East and also his own inventions, thus marrying Serap, the girl from the neighborhood whom he loves. When all is said and done, Osman will realize that the riches he is seeking are closer than he thinks.

results.title: Overnight Republic
results.synopsis: A mayoral candidate wins office by promising to turn a small province into its own country, even as a war – and wacky events with his wife and his advisors – ensue.

results.title: My Brother
results.synopsis: Hakan is a famous 30 year-old artist who makes alternative music. Ozan is a 28 year-old pop star. The brothers haven’t been speaking to each other for years. After many years they find themselves reunited at their father’s funeral. Although they were planning to leave as soon as possible and go their separate ways, their father’s changes everything.

results.title: My Brother 2
results.synopsis: The famous brothers Hakan and Ozan go to an Aegean town to pay their last respects to their late friend Tato even though Hakan is set to marry in two days. Hakan’s fiancée Didem is the daughter of Rize’s well-esteemed tea merchant Muzaffer. Muzaffer is against this marriage because `famous singer` isn`t a trustworthy enough profession for him.

results.title: New Wine In Old Bottle
results.synopsis: The medical team that came to the village in the late 1990s placed an intrauterine contraceptive device in all women with at least three children. As the men of the village sit down and ponder what the device worn by the women is, they conclude that the state has wired them through a series of misunderstandings. Until this misunderstanding is cleared up, everything in the village is set to change.

results.title: Niyazi Gul, The Galloping Vet
results.synopsis: Professor Niyazi Gül, a veterinary surgeon, leads what he considers a quiet life. He divides his time between teaching university students in the veterinary department and searching for the missing ingredient in a magic formula handed down from his grandfather. When Sultan and Rıza decide to race their horses and also hear about Niyazi’s elixir for animals, that`s when things begin to get complicated.

results.title: No Way 2
results.synopsis: People who visit local barber Adnan listen to funny stories that make them all say: “No way!” These stories include Merve, an advertiser who has moved to a village to escape the city life, Aykut, who finds himself at a loss when he learns he is about to be fired, Izzet, who becomes a social media phenomenon using his daughter’s accounts. These diverse stories are waiting to be heard by you as well.

results.title: Oh Dear
results.synopsis: Hüseyin is a young man who lives with his grandparents in a village in Thracian Turkey. He goes to Istanbul to find his father, supporting himself firstly through his clarinet playing and then through his friendship with the singer Firuzan.

results.title: Oh Dear 2
results.synopsis: Having finally found his father in the first film, Huseyin now has to reunite with Mujgan, the girl of his dreams – and present her the ring his ‘big sister’ Firuzan gave him.

results.title: Oh Dear 3
results.synopsis: Life has become difficult for Hüseyin, who married his dream girl Müjgan. He takes every opportunity to look after his family and even plays clarinet at nightclubs to support them.

results.title: Mission Vacation
results.synopsis: The mother of the Mutlu family, Turkan Mutlu, is a cleaning addict. Her husband Sıtkı always falls asleep in front of TV, her teenage daughter Melike is glued to her cell-phone, her little son Ali is constantly on his tablet. At some point, Turkan can’t take it anymore and has a nervous breakdown. As a result of this, the family decides to see a therapist. The therapist advises them to go on vacation.

results.title: Locked on You
results.synopsis: Zekeriya Tastan makes his living selling the traditional çiğ köfte on the streets of Istanbul. Zekeriya ends up saying the wrong words at the wrong time, in the wrong place, and ends up having to leave Istanbul. At Gökçeada, where he sets foot for the first time, not only his life changes completely, but so do the lives of the characters he meets on the island: Hafize, Leyla and Yarim Hasan.

results.title: Locksmith`s Debt
results.synopsis: After his father’s death, poor Berhudar is left dealing with his father’s huge debt to the mob. In one of his many attempts to find a way out of his problem, he meets Ezel. He hopes she will help him get out of the mess he is in. Little does he know the she’s dealing with very similar trouble.

results.title: LOVE LIKE YOU
results.synopsis: Ali lives in a fishermen’s town in the Aegean region. He is in a deep struggle, trying not to lose his family restaurant. One day, a girl comes to town. Where she comes from and where she goes is unknown. She’s Deniz. A great love begins between Deniz, who’s running from her past, and Ali.

results.title: Love, Bitter
results.synopsis: Orhan, who works as a professor of literature at a university in Eskisehir unexpectedly ends his relationship with Ayse whom he was planning to marry and comes to Istanbul where he meets Oya. An unfortunate chain of events during the early stages of their marriage pushes Orhan into a challenging love triangle. Seda, one of his students, is also a part of Orhan`s rough path.

results.title: Love, Now!
results.synopsis: Güney, who is an archaeologist, sets out for Sahilköy when he finds out that his father Salih wants to build a hotel in a historic area. Güney meets Derya, an activist from the village who is also against the construction of the hotel. Things get complicated for Salih, who is ready for any kind of deception, learns that his son is going to Sahilköy. Güney will be caught between his ex-girlfriend Seda, those who want treasure in the village, and those who want a hotel.

results.title: Love, Surreal and Odd
results.synopsis: Four different couples meet at the same party and find themselves in lovey-dovey relationships. But what if these relationships were extraordinary and surreal? And if the couples fought and make up the next minute in their sitcom-like lives? Then there is only one question to ask: Oh lovers, is this what you call love?

results.title: Magic Carpet Ride
results.synopsis: A gang leader recruits a suicidal Superman impersonator, while a woman driving a hot car linked to the gang plots revenge against them and their hero.

results.title: The Magician
results.synopsis: Hokkabaz follows the story of Iskender who is an illusionist. However, except for his childhood friend Maradona, everybody thinks he is a juggler. One day, Iskender and Maradona have to leave Istanbul immediately, and take a big risk including Iskender’s father Sait on their Anatolian tour. This tour helps the three men get closer to each other; as well as preparing a splendid separation for them.

results.title: Maide`s Big Day
results.synopsis: Maide is a skillful woman when it comes to housework. In her neighborhood, she is famous with her get-togethers. Her bulgur salads and pastries are legendary and she is an expert at entertaining her guests. One day Maide’s necklace, a family heirloom, gets stolen during one of her get-togethers. In order to find the missing necklace Maide and her nephew, who is an out-of- towner, make a list of potential thieves.

results.title: Kucuk Yalanlar
results.synopsis: Directed by Bora Onur and starring Nevra Serezli, Ümit Kantarcılar, Pelin Uluksar, Yıldız Asya, Orçun Kaptan, Koray Erkök and Yasmin Erbil, “Little Lies” presents Eda`s calm and small world that is changed when she meets Sarper, an undercover cop. An unexpected love will reveal all the secrets.

results.title: The Last Kick of Our Love
results.synopsis: Çetin`s great love is Esra, who wants to marry someone else. Tahsin suggests going to kickboxing so that Çetin can get over the situation. The kickboxing instructor, Saffet, wants Çetin to fight someone of his choice so he can join the class. Unknowingly, Çetin chooses Saffet Hoca`s daughter Defne, the champion of Turkey, and is hospitalized. When Defne decides to take care of Çetin, a funny and romantic love affair begins.

results.title: Last Stop Kurtulus
results.synopsis: Dramatic comedy centered on a group of women who rebel against domestic violence. The film tells the story of psychologist Eylem who moves into an apartment in the Istanbul neighborhood of Kurtulus after being abandoned by her fiancé two weeks before the wedding. Her new neighbors try to lift the mood transforming themselves into different women who stand up against violence of all kinds.

results.title: Let It Happen, Now!
results.synopsis: The villagers squeeze Güney, Derya, and her family for information, trying to learn if the rumor they heard is true. Fun and amusing events break out as Güney proposes to Derya, Seda hovers around Güney, causing chaos, and the villagers take sides as treasure hunters and hoteliers.

results.title: Jolly Life
results.synopsis: Riza is the world’s most troubled Santa Claus at Christmas time. For one thing, he doesn’t know who Santa Claus is. Whether fake or real, he is Santa Claus now. Bearing the load of the whole world on his shoulders, Santa Claus finally finds a clue.  Life as we know it isn’t more factual than the lies children believe in.

results.title: Kayhan
results.synopsis: Very excited to see his beloved schoolmates again, Kayhan arrives at his high school reunion day but is shocked and appalled as he goes through the pages of the “class of 98” yearbook. Finding out that all his friends hated his guts the whole time, his huge disappointment and anger can only lead to one thing: Revenge!

results.title: Kill Me If You Dare
results.synopsis: Can a lottery prize save a marriage that has run out of steam? Or will it end it for good? In this entertaining comedy Demet and Okan find out the answer.

results.title: Hot Sweet Sour
results.synopsis: Murat and Duygu are madly in love. After their graduation, Murat asks Duygu to marry him. However, Duygu has other plans for her future. They sign an agreement to get back together after five years, but life has other plans for them.

results.title: Husband Factor
results.synopsis: A thirty-year-old who`s never taken the traditional path to love, is tutored by her friends and family before reconnecting with her high school crush.

results.title: Hadi Be Oglum
results.synopsis: Ali, who is a fisherman, dedicates his life to his son Efe, who has a communication problem. Efe is not a child who laughs and plays and responds to what he hears. Ali feels lonely as he tries to connect with his son. His greatest desire is to know that his son understands him. The father`s love for his son, which carries the memories of his father, his mother, and the woman he loves, will shape their lives.

results.title: Happy Family Journal
results.synopsis: Retired colonel Yildirim is rather stern and authoritarian in disposition. He has taken on the responsibility of his kids after his wife’s death. After a certain age, all kids run away from their father, having estranged themselves from him as well as from each other. Years later however, the siblings have to get back together after their father is involved in an accident.

results.title: Hayir Oluversin Gari
results.synopsis:
Derya, who wants to divorce Güney, can`t get what she wants, forgets the letter and the bag full of money her father left for her, and leaves the house. Sadri decides to have the hotel project drawn, as misunderstandings arise in the village square and word leaks out about the bag of money. Now begins a series of events in which what happened between Derya and Güney and the events in the hotel affair are interwoven.

Some flashing lights sequences or patterns may affect photosensitive viewers.

results.title: Here Comes The Holiday
results.synopsis: When it comes to summer vacations, everyone has their own expectations. "Here Comes The Holiday" is here to meet all these expactations in one scenario. BKM Atelier team move their classic TV show "Çok Güzel Hareketler Bunlar" to the silver screen in an attempt to show all aspects of summer vacation around a comedic plot.

results.title: Get Well, Now!
results.synopsis: Derya is angry with Güney. Güney consults imam Suphi on the issue and the imam refers him to Deniz. Seda does not give up on her love. She buys a caravan and settles in the village and begins to gather information about Derya. Seda finds out that Derya is not Sadri`s daughter. Showing the file, Seda tells Güney that the family is a swindler and Derya is not Sadri`s own daughter. They are all shocked.

results.title: Girl`s Robbery
results.synopsis: After her husband leaves, Gulay is now a single mother struggling to get by. She has health issues to overcome and bills to pay. Things go south and the bank seizes the sewing machines of her small textile mill. One night, she confides in her best friends Bilge, Nihal and Durdane and they decide the only way out is to rob a bank. The idea that has started out as a joke quickly becomes real.

results.title: The Goal Of My Life
results.synopsis: Ugur is a cheerful young man in his thirties and a fan of the soccer team Fenerbahce. Pinar is a 25 year-old beautiful young workaholic woman. Ugur meets Pinar by chance and falls in love with her. The story of these two young people unfolds as a romantic comedy.

results.title: First Love
results.synopsis: One of the notable families of an Aegean town, the Arifoğulları family, is far from their old days of glory. The death of Grandpa Arif Arifoğlu leads to the emergence of secrets that have been hidden for years. With the return of Asaf, there will be a big showdown in the family. The return of the great uncle who has been spoken of as a hero since his childhood will make Arif Ege very happy.

results.title: For Both Of Us
results.synopsis: Cicek is stuck in the life that her family wants her to live and lives in a hick town where she falls in love with the newly appointed literature teacher. Dogan can`t stay away from Cicek even though he tries. How long can a young heart resist such a love? And can that love heal a man`s wounded heart? Dogan and Cicek are looking for the answers together.

results.title: Eternal Love
results.synopsis: Can is a passionate and dedicated doctor who became a professor at a young age. Zeynep enlivens her being with small joys and leads a modest life with her sister as a cleaning lady. Time suddenly stops for Can and Zeynep when they fall in love with each other unexpectedly. As if belonging to two different worlds is not enough, their perspectives on life differ like day and night.

results.title: Deliha
results.synopsis: Short on sense but long on self-confidence, dotty ``Deliha`` sets her sights on a hunky photographer who opens up a shop in her neighborhood. A warm neighborhood story awaits us.

results.title: Deliha 2
results.synopsis: While chasing her dream of becoming a chef, ``Deliha`` cooks up trouble in the kitchen with her wild, kooky and unsuspecting ways. Will Zeliha find herself in this new adventure?

results.title: Don`t Marry Him
results.synopsis: What would you do if your daughter wanted to marry someone you don`t approve of at all? Especially if you are always right about your reasons for it, even if she is not aware of this. Don`t Marry Him tells the story of what Adil, a taxi driver, does to prevent his daughter`s marriage to a man that he thinks is dangerous. And there is no limit to what he would do as the father of his girl.

results.title: The Classy Bride
results.synopsis: Selin, the spoilt and only child of a wealthy family, is dragged into an unwanted marriage, but she manages to escape on her wedding day. As she heads for the Aegean on a bus, she meets Asiye who tells Selin that she is being forcibly sent to her relatives. Selin offers to change places. In "The Classy Bride", you will witness the adventures of Selin, a girl in her 20s, as she runs away from marriage.

results.title: Come Together, Now!
results.synopsis: Güney`s marriage proposal to Derya drives Salih crazy and Derya is grounded. Sadri fires  his gun to scare Güney who will realize he has no choice but to abduct Derya and marry her secretly. When Seda learns about all these and that Güney`s father is the one who killed Derya`s father, she immediately goes after Güney. Seda shows the video to Güney and Sadri shows it to Derya.

results.title: Dance With The Jackals
results.synopsis: Servet works as an accountant for a big company. He gets carried away with his money hungry wife’s words and makes a plan to steal a huge amount of money from the company’s online accounts. His best friend Gokhan is part of this plan. His other two friends are extras in this treacherous plan. But he overlooks the fact that his friends are as smartass as he is.

results.title: Dance With The Jackals 2
results.synopsis: After their dance with jackals, our heroes found themselves in prison. One day, they find out that volunteers are wanted for an experiment. Since after the experiment they would be let go on probation, they accept to participate. They take the medicine that supposedly prevents them from committing crimes and they promise each other not to be jackals again when they are free.

results.title: Dance With The Jackals 3
results.synopsis: Brother-in-law Gokhan, Accountant Servet, Meatball Necmi and Del Piero Hikmet are released from prison on probation and they join group therapy in order to be reintegrated to society. Del Piero Hikmet, taking the ferry without knowing that his life is about to change, meets Mihriban: A mute woman that he could not possibly forget for the rest of his life.

results.title: Dance With The Jackals 4
results.synopsis: While our heroes are being disciplined by life with poverty, they find themselves living together due to financial trouble. One day, Barber Huseyin shows up with a “Map” in his hand. The son of his uncle has passed away and left the map as his legacy.  Our heroes convince themselves that it is a treasure map. Following the glimpse of hope, they set off to Edirne. Is there really a buried treasure?

results.title: The Butterfly`s Dream
results.synopsis: Forced to work in a coal mine during World War II, two young poets find some escape when they both fall for the same woman. A story of love and friendship.

results.title: Bygones Be Bygones
results.synopsis: Zafer is still a bachelor and lives with his mom, Döndü, in a small town on the Aegean coast. Depressed by her son’s breakup with Mehtap, the prettiest girl in town, Döndü knows that the clock is ticking as far as his marriage prospects are concerned and resolves to do something about it. Zafer, meanwhile, no-frills boat on a blue cruise and that`s where things take an unusual turn.

results.title: Can`t Be True
results.synopsis: Selvi, who poses an exemplary marriage, has no doubts about her husband`s fidelity. Until she learns that her husband Sami has been hospitalized because of an accident! She learns that her husband was not alone in the accident. Selvi`s crazy family, who does not trust any man because of their bad experiences, goes after Sami to find out the truth and gets into trouble.

results.title: The Boss Wants A Happy Ending
results.synopsis: Sinan is sent to Capadocia by his boss to write a screenplay. There is one condition: his boss wants a happy ending. As he waits for inspiration, Sinan finds himself running first into Eylul and then into soap opera star Faruk, his former good friend and present enemy.

api_list.name: /search/deleted
api_list.description:
Search for Deleted Titles by Country or Title Name
delete_date will either take a single date and check for all titles added after that date or it will take 2 dates separated by a comma to check titles added between them.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter country code e.g. GB

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: title_id
optional_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 3jLIGMDYINqD for The Mandalorian

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: CSV list of country IDs e.g. 46,78

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: search all titles by name

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com/search/deleted"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

results.title: The Irregular at Magic High School: Reminiscence Arc
The Strongest Sage with the Weakest Crest
Home Alone 2: Lost in New York

api_list.name: /search/genres
api_list.description: Search for genre by genre name

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: search for all queries by query name

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

api_list.code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /search/countries
api_list.description: Search for all available countries by name

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: search country by country name

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: search by 2 letter country code e.g. GB for Great Britain

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com/search/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /search/people
api_list.description: Search for people by person name

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: search for a person by their name e.g. cruise for Tom Cruise

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com/search/people"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-disney.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /title/images
api_list.description: All Images associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: title_id
required_parameters.description: actual title ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/genres
api_list.description: All Genres Associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: title_id
required_parameters.description: actual title ID for the title e.g. 3jLIGMDYINqD for The Mandalorian

api_list.name: /title/people
api_list.description: All People Associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: title_id
required_parameters.description: actual title ID for the title e.g. 3jLIGMDYINqD for The Mandalorian

api_list.name: /title/episodes
api_list.description: All Episodes associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: title_id
required_parameters.description: actual title ID for the title e.g. 3jLIGMDYINqD for The Mandalorian

required_parameters.name: season_id
required_parameters.description: actual title season ID e.g. b423b024-b641-45e8-a075-575c35292100 for Mandalorian season 1

api_list.name: /title/countries
api_list.description: All Country/Language information associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: title_id
required_parameters.description: actual title ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/details
api_list.description: General Details associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: title_id
required_parameters.description: actual title ID for the title e.g. 3jLIGMDYINqD for The Mandalorian
